mapper.select: SELECT sdi.id, sdi.domain_name AS name FROM sm_domain_info sdi LEFT JOIN sm_domain_category sdc ON sdc.domain_info_id = sdi.id LEFT JOIN prod_catalog pc ON sdc.product_category_id = pc.id WHERE sdi.domain_status='1' AND pc.url=#{catalogUrl}
SELECT sd.dic_name AS name, sd.dic_value AS id FROM prod_catalog pc LEFT JOIN system_dictionary sd ON sd.dic_value = pc.convert_unit WHERE pc.url=#{catalogUrl}
SELECT pc.loss_factor FROM prod_catalog pc WHERE pc.url=#{catalogUrl}

SELECT price FROM prod_sku_price WHERE sku_id = ( SELECT id FROM prod_sku WHERE code =#{skuCode} ) AND DATE_FORMAT(price_start_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{date} AND price_type=#{priceType} ORDER BY price_start_date DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT use_decimal FROM prod_catalog WHERE url =#{catalogUrl}

SELECT ssd.*, aa.category_code, aa.category_detail_code FROM sm_sku_dosage ssd JOIN ( SELECT spm.id, spm.category_code, spm.category_detail_code FROM sm_project_material spm WHERE spm.contract_code = #{contractCode} AND spm.category_code != 'PACKAGESTANDARD' ) aa ON aa.id = ssd.project_material_id
SELECT IFNULL(cc.valuate_area,0) AS area , IFNULL(cc.meal_price,0) AS price FROM customer_contract cc WHERE cc.contract_code = #{contractCode}
mapper.delete: delete from sm_sku_dosage where project_material_id in (select id from sm_project_material where contract_code = #{contractCode})
mapper.select: select ssd.* from sm_sku_dosage as ssd LEFT JOIN sm_project_material as spm on spm.id = ssd.project_material_id where spm.ontract_code = #{contractCode} and spm.product_category_url LIKE CONCAT('%',#{changeCategoryUrl},'%')
